message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with a source coding problem with distortion constraints, which is a classic topic in information theory (cs.IT). The problem involves a scalar source and a vector helper, which suggests that the paper may also be relevant to multimedia (cs.MM) and signal processing (cs.SI). The use of a Gaussian achievable scheme and the focus on covariance matrices also suggest a connection to machine learning (cs.LG) and computer vision (cs.CV).
